news.title: Lily Allen Announces 2026 North American Tour
news.summary: Her first North American dates in seven years will feature West End Girl performed in full

news.title: 8 New Albums You Should Listen to Now: Melody’s Echo Chamber, Redveil, and More
news.summary: Stream new releases from Melody’s Echo Chamber, Redveil, Western Vinyl, Voices From the Lake, the Deep, DJ Narciso, Dove Ellis, and Karri

news.title: Jane Remover Drops Surprise New ♡ EP: Listen
news.summary: A six-song project featuring four fan favorites and two brand-new entries

news.title: Ireland, Spain, and Others Withdraw from Eurovision as Israel Granted 2026 Entry
news.summary: The Netherlands and Slovenia will also boycott next year’s competition after the European Broadcasting Union declined to hold a vote on Israel’s participation
